item.title: Former UFC Champion ‘Playing With The Idea’ Of Moving Up In Weight
item.description: Former UFC middleweight champion Robert Whittaker says he is "playing around with the idea" of moving up to light heavyweight.

item.title: Dana White Announces UFC Signing Dynamic 19-Year-Old On Instagram
item.description: The UFC has just signed a dynamic 19-year-old prospect and Dana White took to Instagram to show her reaction when the news came through.
